{{disambig-more: '''''Beasts of Tolkien: A Colouring Book''''' is an [[Wikipedia:Coloring_book#Adult_coloring_books
Tolkien's World: adult colouring book]], illustrated by Mauro Mazzara and Andrea Piparo. The illustrations are based on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s writings.<ref name=AMUK>{{webcite

This mystical colouring book presents an abundance of famous scenes and characters inspired by Tolkien's [[Middle-earth]]. From [[Gandalf]] the Grey to the humble [[Hobbits]], take time off from the busy pace of life and indulge your imagination while exploring the enthralling world of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and other tales. There's something new on every page as you discover the intricate elvish designs, fearsome characters and breath-taking landscapes - perfect to satisfy [[Fandom
[[Tolkien's World (disambiguation)]]}}: Tolkien fans]] and beyond. This book is unofficial and not authorised by the [[Tolkien Estate]] or [[HarperCollins]] Publishers.<ref name=AMUK/>}}

Tolkien's World: Beasts of Tolkien: A Colouring Book]]'' (by the same illustrators)
